title: Traditional Herb Bundle | D.R. Snell Nursery
author: Jessica Snell
description: Mix of 6 traditional herbs to include basil, chives, parsley, oregano, rosemary, and thyme!
cleaned_text: Description Enjoy fresh and flavorful herbs straight out of your back yard. This herb bundle includes the classic herbs most everyone uses in daily cooking. Mix of 6 herbs to include basil, chives, parsley, oregano, rosemary, and thyme! We are a full service garden center, serving the community for over 30 years. We locally source plants and supply organic options. We have friendly experts on hand to inspire and teach, no matter what your experience level. We want to help beautify your surroundings, with our diverse selection of trees, shrubs, perennials, annuals, houseplants and home decor. Summer Hours: Mon. - Tues. 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Thurs. -Sat. 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Sunday 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM CLOSED SUNDAY 9/3 AND WEDNESDAY 9/6 1025 Ridge 301-829-9709 [Click here for a map & directions](https://goo.gl/maps/LizSBfMgn3q) Click the button above to sign up for our emailers. You will receive updates, specials and coupons. It is that easy! $16.99 Mix of 6 traditional herbs to include basil, chives, parsley, oregano, rosemary, and thyme! Enjoy fresh and flavorful herbs straight out of your back yard. This herb bundle includes the classic herbs most everyone uses in daily cooking.
